verses.t: On that night{H3915} could not{H5074} the king{H4428} sleep{H8142}, and he commanded{H559} to bring{H935} the book{H5612} of records{H2146} of the chronicles{H3117}; and they were read{H7121} before{H6440} the king{H4428}.could…: Heb. the king's sleep fled away
